welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Beverly Hills, the glamorous city known for its luxurious shopping, stunning architecture, and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and uncover all the charming treasures this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves as the hub for all commercial flights and private charters.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to private jets and offers luxury amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at LAX, primarily used by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Aeromexico, Air Canada, and Air China.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Used by Delta Air Lines and its SkyTeam partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: One of the largest terminals at LAX, used by American Airlines and its Oneworld partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, and Hawaiian Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Used by several domestic airlines, including Allegiant Air, Frontier Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Used by United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The main international terminal at LAX, serving multiple airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Limited free access, premium options available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers a more luxurious experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Van Nuys Airport caters to high-end travelers and offers luxurious amenities.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport, serving domestic and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Long Beach Municipal Airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Long Beach Municipal Airport.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Long Beach Municipal Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
